price: 28. Bakolobaka: Ezali bino nde bobengaki biso na makasi. (na bopengwi)
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qālū innakum kuntum tatūnanā ʿani al-yamīni
